definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: This article on shiitake mushroom's cultivation management, the recovery processing gives the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 本文就香菇的栽培管理，採收加工給以介紹。

sentences.english: Hope to show them to help deal with the vampire.
sentences.chinese: 希望顯祖給以協助對付吸血鬼。

sentences.english: One non-exercise group received quercetin while the other did not.
sentences.chinese: 其中一組被給以槲皮素餵養，而另一組沒有。

sentences.english: The love and care you have given us will encourage us to go through a long and arduous journey.
sentences.chinese: 您給以我們的愛和眷注將激昂着我們走過艱鉅困苦。

sentences.english: Treatment with iron usually Brings quick improvement.
sentences.chinese: 給以鐵劑治療可使症狀迅速改善。

sentences.english: Give it time, it will melt.
This will be based on the study of.
sentences.chinese: 本文將結合本人研究的課題《壇經》給以佐證。

sentences.english: Thank you for giving us this singular privilege of being part of this commencement ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你們給以我們加入此次結業典禮的殊榮。

sentences.english: Oils fuels the skin's natural hydration and healing process in the dermis layer of skin where stretch marks form.
sentences.chinese: 油可以給以皮膚自然的水份和癒合真皮層的受孕紋。

sentences.english: The actor needed to be prompted frequently.
sentences.chinese: 那演員需要經常給以提詞。

sentences.english: It had dawned upon me that I have never placed a proper valuation upon womankind .
sentences.chinese: 我這才覺得，我一向不曾對女性給以應有的估價。

sentences.english: This essay tries to give an objective comment on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖對這一切給以客觀的申說。

sentences.english: Your foot, meanwhile, may not be giving you the stability you need.
sentences.chinese: 同時你的腳也可能沒有給以足夠穩定的支撐。

sentences.english: Or if that isn't allowed under their guidelines, campaign for a no-fee policy.
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以問一下圖書館員工，給以幫助的途徑。

sentences.english: Prayer gives us hope and changes our outlook in life.
sentences.chinese: 禱告給以我們但願，變化我們的人生不美觀。

sentences.english: In this essay the Ampere Circuital Theorem is accurately illustrated and detailed exact demonstration is made upon it.
sentences.chinese: 本文對安培環路定理給以準確的說明和詳細的論證。
